template.template: SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0
template.name: SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: Integra E High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN1)=2
trigger.name: LAN1 disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN2)=2
trigger.name: LAN2 disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 disabled

item.name: WAN Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemAcquireStatus)=1 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemAcquireStatus)=3
trigger.name: Modem Acquire Status Error

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemBandwidth,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemBandwidth,#2))=1 and last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemBandwidth)>0
trigger.name: Bandwidth change Notification

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemCarrierOffset)<=-1000 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemCarrierOffset)>=1000
trigger.name: Modem Carrier Offset Alarm

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemErroredSecond,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemErroredSecond,#2))=1
trigger.name: Errored seconds increased

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemFECload)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: FEC load Alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemNormalizedMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: modem MSE alarm

item.name: Modem Capacity Rx
item.description: Rx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemSeverelyErroredSecond)=1
trigger.name: Severely Errored seconds increased

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem temperature Alarm

item.name: Modem Capacity Tx
item.description: Tx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioPLL)=1
trigger.name: PLL status error

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioRxLevelState)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioRxLevelState)=3 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioRxLevelState)=4
trigger.name: Rx level Alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio Temperature Alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioTxMute)=1 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEradioTxMute)=3
trigger.name: Radio Tx muted

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System Board Temperature Alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysCPUload)>80
trigger.name: CPU load Notification

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysCPUtemperature)>={$TEMPMAX100} or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysCPUtemperature)<={$TEMPMIN}
trigger.name: CPU Temperature Alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU current Alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU power Alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysPSUvoltage),{$PSUVOLTMIN},{$PSUVOLTMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU voltage Alarm

item.name: LAN1 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/LAN1_integraEifPortOperStatus)=2
trigger.name: LAN1 port down

dependency.name: LAN1 disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN1)=2

item.name: LAN2 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/LAN2_integraEifPortOperStatus)=2
trigger.name: LAN2 port down

dependency.name: LAN2 disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN2)=2

item.name: LAN3 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/LAN3_integraEifPortOperStatus)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 port down

dependency.name: LAN3 disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2

item.name: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Location name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#2))=1 and length(last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name))>0
trigger.name: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: System name has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: System uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/system.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

dependency.name: No SNMP data collection
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseExpire)<=1209600 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseGenStatus)=2
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseExpire)>1209600 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseGenStatus)=1
trigger.name: License expired or soon will expire

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemModulation)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-E template V1.2 for Zabbix 6.0/integraEmodemTxModulation)
trigger.name: Tx Modulation differs from configured maximum
